title: Understanding government
creator_credit: Fontana Films, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Donald Dagett
brief_description: An introduction to government in Australia covering elections, the work of Parliament, the general organisation of the Public Service and the wide range of activities for which the government is responsible.
